Exceptions:
Expecting a field name but nothing was acceptable, so moving onto next whitespace
itle = {A } # "Book",                   % an in-entry comment  editor = {  John 
                                        ^

Expecting an = between the field name and the field value
= {A } # "Book",                   % an in-entry comment  editor = {  John Q.  R
                                        ^

Expecting an = between the field name and the field value
"Book",                   % an in-entry comment  editor = {  John Q.  Random} # 
                                        ^

Expecting an = between the field name and the field value
                 % an in-entry comment  editor = {  John Q.  Random} # junk,  pu
                                        ^
